_sText:
UPDATE 26.06.2010 - New V4 version for Orange Box Engine


Here's a new version of de_residentevil2 :

Changelog since first version :

- more details and custom objects
- new ways (B is more accessible)
- new lighting + ambience
- skybox + overview
- secret areas with weapons (you need objects to open some doors)
- more spawns (24 vs 24)

This new version is maybe more complex but I hope you'll enjoy it. 



Video :
